original: intros c s H_step H_fair H_occurred. unfold now, occurred in H_occurred. destruct H_occurred as [evt [H_head H_occurred]]. unfold evt_a, nwPackets in H_head. destruct (hd s) as [a l t]. simpl in H_head. destruct a as [src dst body]. rewrite H_head. right. exists 0. simpl. unfold Nth. left. reflexivity.
